about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: When driving on an interstate, to avoid traffic merging from on-ramps to your right, the best thing to do is to:

about.name: When driving on an interstate, to avoid traffic merging from on-ramps to your right, the best thing to do is to:

hasPart.assesses: When driving on an interstate, to avoid traffic merging from on-ramps to your right, the best thing to do is to: | When driving on an interstate, to avoid traffic merging from on-ramps to your right, the best thing to do is to: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When driving on an interstate highway, be aware of upcoming on-ramps. When traffic permits, move out of the right-hand lane to allow vehicles to enter from the on-ramps to your right.

comment.text: Change lanes to the left.
Slow down.
Maintain your speed and position.
Change lanes to the left.

answerExplanation.text: When driving on an interstate highway, be aware of upcoming on-ramps. When traffic permits, move out of the right-hand lane to allow vehicles to enter from the on-ramps to your right.

comment.text: When driving on an interstate, to avoid traffic merging from on-ramps to your right, the best thing to do is to: | When driving on an interstate highway, be aware of upcoming on-ramps. When traffic permits, move out of the right-hand lane to allow vehicles to enter from the on-ramps to your right.

hasPart.assesses: This sign means: | This sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. Warning signs may alert drivers to areas where animals, people, and vehicles are likely to cross traffic.

comment.text: Watch for bicycles.
Bicycles not allowed.
Bicycle repair shop ahead.
Watch for bicycles.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. Warning signs may alert drivers to areas where animals, people, and vehicles are likely to cross traffic.

comment.text: This sign means: | Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. Warning signs may alert drivers to areas where animals, people, and vehicles are likely to cross traffic.

hasPart.name: When approaching a roundabout, you should always:

about.name: When approaching a roundabout, you should always:

hasPart.assesses: When approaching a roundabout, you should always: | When approaching a roundabout, you should always: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When approaching a roundabout, slow down. A roundabout is designed to be driven at a low speed.

comment.text: Increase your speed.
Decrease your speed.
Maintain your speed.
Decrease your speed.

answerExplanation.text: When approaching a roundabout, slow down. A roundabout is designed to be driven at a low speed.

comment.text: When approaching a roundabout, you should always: | When approaching a roundabout, slow down. A roundabout is designed to be driven at a low speed.

hasPart.name: To enter a gap in highway traffic:

about.name: To enter a gap in highway traffic:

hasPart.assesses: To enter a gap in highway traffic: | To enter a gap in highway traffic: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Whenever you want to change lanes or enter traffic, you must be sure that there are no vehicles in your way in the lane you want to enter. Always check for traffic to the side of and behind your vehicle before you change lanes.

suggestedAnswer.text: Watch only the vehicles behind the gap.

comment.text: Watch only the vehicles behind the gap.

suggestedAnswer.text: Check behind you, then watch the vehicle ahead.

comment.text: Check behind you, then watch the vehicle ahead.

suggestedAnswer.text: Speed up and let the other vehicles make way.

comment.text: Speed up and let the other vehicles make way.

acceptedAnswer.text: Check behind you, then watch the vehicle ahead.

comment.text: Check behind you, then watch the vehicle ahead.

answerExplanation.text: Whenever you want to change lanes or enter traffic, you must be sure that there are no vehicles in your way in the lane you want to enter. Always check for traffic to the side of and behind your vehicle before you change lanes.

comment.text: To enter a gap in highway traffic: | Whenever you want to change lanes or enter traffic, you must be sure that there are no vehicles in your way in the lane you want to enter. Always check for traffic to the side of and behind your vehicle before you change lanes.

hasPart.name: You are driving on the freeway. The vehicle in front of you is a large truck. You should drive:

about.name: You are driving on the freeway. The vehicle in front of you is a large truck. You should drive:

hasPart.assesses: You are driving on the freeway. The vehicle in front of you is a large truck. You should drive: | You are driving on the freeway. The vehicle in front of you is a large truck. You should drive: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When you follow so closely behind a truck that you cannot see the truck driver’s side view mirrors, the trucker cannot see you and has no way of knowing you are there. Tailgating a truck, or any vehicle, is dangerous because you take away your own cushion of safety if the vehicle in front of you stops quickly.

suggestedAnswer.text: Closely behind the truck in bad weather because the driver can see farther ahead than you can.

comment.text: Closely behind the truck in bad weather because the driver can see farther ahead than you can.

suggestedAnswer.text: Farther behind the truck than you would when following a passenger vehicle.

comment.text: Farther behind the truck than you would when following a passenger vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: No more than one car length behind the truck so the driver can see you.

comment.text: No more than one car length behind the truck so the driver can see you.

acceptedAnswer.text: Farther behind the truck than you would when following a passenger vehicle.

comment.text: Farther behind the truck than you would when following a passenger vehicle.

answerExplanation.text: When you follow so closely behind a truck that you cannot see the truck driver’s side view mirrors, the trucker cannot see you and has no way of knowing you are there. Tailgating a truck, or any vehicle, is dangerous because you take away your own cushion of safety if the vehicle in front of you stops quickly.

comment.text: You are driving on the freeway. The vehicle in front of you is a large truck. You should drive: | When you follow so closely behind a truck that you cannot see the truck driver’s side view mirrors, the trucker cannot see you and has no way of knowing you are there. Tailgating a truck, or any vehicle, is dangerous because you take away your own cushion of safety if the vehicle in front of you stops quickly.

hasPart.name: Work zone barriers, drums, cones, and signs are used to:

about.name: Work zone barriers, drums, cones, and signs are used to:

hasPart.assesses: Work zone barriers, drums, cones, and signs are used to: | Work zone barriers, drums, cones, and signs are used to: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Work zones on highways have become increasingly dangerous places for both workers and drivers. When approaching a work zone, watch for materials such as cones, barrels, signs, large vehicles, and workers in brightly colored vests to warn you and direct you.

suggestedAnswer.text: Make drivers angry about slow traffic.

comment.text: Make drivers angry about slow traffic.
Inconvenience drivers.

suggestedAnswer.text: Keep traffic out of hazardous work zones.

comment.text: Keep traffic out of hazardous work zones.

acceptedAnswer.text: Keep traffic out of hazardous work zones.

comment.text: Keep traffic out of hazardous work zones.

answerExplanation.text: Work zones on highways have become increasingly dangerous places for both workers and drivers. When approaching a work zone, watch for materials such as cones, barrels, signs, large vehicles, and workers in brightly colored vests to warn you and direct you.

comment.text: Work zone barriers, drums, cones, and signs are used to: | Work zones on highways have become increasingly dangerous places for both workers and drivers. When approaching a work zone, watch for materials such as cones, barrels, signs, large vehicles, and workers in brightly colored vests to warn you and direct you.
